website_summaries.verdict: Users looking for a pack of traditional pool noodles will find their match in this inexpensive, durable product.
pros: Comes in a pack of four with a variety of vivid colors
Smaller diameter for those who prefer a thinner noodle
Less porous noodle keeps product from filling with water
cons: Many buyers were not impressed by the noodle's thin diameter

customer_reviews.title: Strong sturdy and long enough for adult use!
customer_reviews.text: These pool noodles are wonderful! I teach a water aerobics class in my community pool and we were in need of replacement noodles. Many of the other noodles we have purchased are very short, ideal for kids, but not for adults. These look like they will last quite awhile and are long enough for adult use. They are less porous than the cheaper noodles. The class is very happy with them. I purchased 4 as a start but will definitely purchase again! I recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Carl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fit the sling seats
customer_reviews.text: The noodles are fine to use alone in the pool but I went along with the amazon “frequently bought together” and ordered them for the sling seats for the pool and they are way too small. They slide out of the slings and if you sit on the sling you sink. Even my 100 pound daughter in law sank. I would recommend buying the noodles to use as a noodle in the pool but don’t buy them to use the n the sling chairs as recommended in amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Durkee

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I actually cut these down and use them to keep tall boots upright and purses from losing their shape! Much lighter and more durable than any other stuffing material.
customer_reviews.author: ECY

customer_reviews.title: Small!
customer_reviews.text: These are a LOT smaller than I expected (even though they do saay 2.2 inches). I was thinking they were like the old noodles that people used in pools and such.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer Dude

customer_reviews.title: They split in half easily
customer_reviews.text: 5 minutes out of the box, four noodles have already started to split on the inside, one has extended to the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Collector

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to pad the wires for my clothing drying rack to prevent lines being left in clothes that have to be line dried or laid out flat to dry. Cutting them wasn’t fun or all that easy but they end result was just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Denise D.

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I watched a U Tube video showing how to use pool noodles to make quilt sandwiches so decided to try it myself. I need 3 for most projects, and the 4th can be cut and attached to make extensions for the 3 should I need it. They came yesterday (a day ahead of schedule) and are perfect for my project. Packaging was secure too. Seem like quality pool noodles, but I've not had any experience with them before. They are fine for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Merriweather Gertrude

customer_reviews.title: I should have checked diameter...
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were the big noodles for adults. They're really small - long but not very big around. I seriously can't tell them apart from the one I bought at Walmart on clearance for $.99.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Power

customer_reviews.title: Good improvise
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to fill the small gap between the side of my sons car bed and his mattress. Worked like a charm! No more fear of a broken ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lynn Herr

customer_reviews.title: Pool noodle
customer_reviews.text: Great for a couple time use. Bought them for a pool party. A littler thinner than the ones you can buy at the store but they did the job and lasted all season
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: For kids not adults
customer_reviews.text: These are the thinner noodles for kids. The adults did use them, it will keep you from sinking but kind of flimsy to hold on to as an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pool noodles - the thin noodles.
customer_reviews.text: They are of excellent of Quality. What more do you want. All four were delivered in excellent quality. Kids love them. These are the thin noodles which is what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: LikesAmazonGuy

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Use these noodles everyday in the FL sun and they are holding up well. No cracks or flaking from them.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: had to buy this in winter when pool stores closed.. so it was well worth the $10 premium with free ship.. very happy with the order.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lake or pool!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a lake trip. They worked great and we had a blast. They are very buoyant.
customer_reviews.author: FLorence

customer_reviews.title: For standing up my Boots
customer_reviews.text: Used to make my boots stand up! Cut them in half and Works great.
customer_reviews.author: stokes_88

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected not like the larger ones you normally see. That said it I’d a piece of foam so not much to review.
customer_reviews.author: Ast

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then a regular noodle and doesn’t hold as much weight
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the use that I intended for it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: they’re very sturdy and endured what I put them through without showing ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these to make a prop for a convention. Thinner than I expected but they still served the purpose incredibly well, they’re very sturdy and endured what I put them through without showing any signs of weakening. I’ll definitely be ordering these again for future projects!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Essy to cut with a knife, Slit it length wise one side only then cut it to length, opened it up and placed one on the top and bottom of a home made patio door as sweeps to keep snow from blowing into the patio. works great.
customer_reviews.author: L. shores

customer_reviews.title: Great nerd gun targets
customer_reviews.text: I used these and cut them up for targets for my grandsons Nerf guns. He lives the targets.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McM

customer_reviews.title: skinny
customer_reviews.text: These noodles do not allow for adult weight. Two are usually needed.
customer_reviews.author: mary king

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these! I could have bought them at the dollar store! They are the skinny ones not sturdy enough for an adult! Can’t use for my water exercising in deep end. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D

customer_reviews.title: ... to keep the covers in place and they work great for it
customer_reviews.text: I used these to tuck into furniture to keep the covers in place and they work great for it. Very sturdy, will be buying more in the summer for the pool.

customer_reviews.title: Love it I bought them to put around the coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it I bought them to put around the coffee table edges for child proof purpose :)

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby proof! Little one used to hit his head all the time at the coffee table... no more!

customer_reviews.title: Worked great....
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to pad a dog pen, these worked great!

customer_reviews.text: Love the color. These are the skinnier ones vs thicker noodles

customer_reviews.title: The quality was ok. My daughter is 5 and ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality was ok. My daughter is 5 and it didn't hold her up as well as her other noodle that is a little thicker.

customer_reviews.title: worked great!
customer_reviews.text: used in our yard to cover metal stakes for plants and sprinkler posts so our dog's don't get injured running around . worked great!

customer_reviews.title: Did not like them, was not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Did not like them, was not as pictured, will not hold up an infant...half of what a pool noodle should be!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were exactly perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The box was completely beat up and rough looking. Thankfully it was just pool foam toys! They were exactly perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: All the same color
customer_reviews.text: Very annoyed that we received 4 tubes of the same color. If I had wanted that I would have ordered that option. I understand that the description said 'random colors' but 4 blue tubes does not seem random and does not fit our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Museum

customer_reviews.title: ... for head protection on an I-beam and I really like the multiple colors for
customer_reviews.text: I am using them for head protection on an I-beam and I really like the multiple colors for that
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: These noodles were just what I was looking for. ...
customer_reviews.text: These noodles were just what I was looking for. They allow you to bend them or roll them into shapes. I used these in particular to roll into lollipops for Christmas decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a disappointing product. My daughters are 50 and 52 lbs respectively. In order for either of them to not have their mouths almost sink into the pool water if the noodle is under their arms, they need two noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as expected when I compared to measurement
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about foam noodles. They are what they are. Price was good.

customer_reviews.title: ... long but are only 54" Will not wrap around like the old ones did
customer_reviews.text: They were to be 58" long but are only 54" Will not wrap around like the old ones did.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth bogert

customer_reviews.title: Too much money
customer_reviews.text: They are very very thin. They are the same noodles you can purchase anywhere for $1. I thought for the price they would be higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I got these to line the sharp edges of my RV to put the cover over.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to put over the sharp edges of the RV under the cover. It keeps the sharp places from poking through the cover.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Collier

customer_reviews.title: GO TO DOLLAR TREE INSTEAD
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in these noodles. They are identical to the ones they sell at our local dollar tree...I assumed that I was getting a better quality product here...

customer_reviews.text: You get 4. They are not large diameter but that is what was described. Dense material. Using as padding for laying paddle boards on in truck

customer_reviews.text: Great quality , they are thicker than the dollar store

customer_reviews.title: Great. We use them in the garage
customer_reviews.text: Great. We use them in the garage, screwed to the wall for bumpers. So I don’t ruin the cars or the walls.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: They were and are working fine holding up lettuce,kale and a couple of other green in a hydro. container .

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as quick as expected. Seem pretty sturdy. Only thing was they sent all of the same color. Would have liked a mixture but over all pleased so far.

customer_reviews.text: We use these under the couch so that the dog balls do not roll under to where we can't get them :)

customer_reviews.title: Noodles are not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, they are very thin when compared to other noodles I have used in the past.

customer_reviews.title: They are smaller then I imagined them being but the ...
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller then I imagined them being but the kids can still float around with them. Using two at once seems a little more supportive.

customer_reviews.title: they work great.
customer_reviews.text: used them as cushions on dorm bed ladder rungs tore up really fast. taped them. they work great.

customer_reviews.title: 4th color would of been nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Did not receive a purple one and was using for a project and the 4th color would of been nice, but these are well made.
customer_reviews.author: AZBassin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality , came on time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to order, no choice on colors. Assorted only. I got green, blue, yellow pink. I got to use as a bumper on my baby's changing table. Good thickness of foam, easy to cut and didn't create much debris. The box it came in was pretty beat up.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and useless.

customer_reviews.title: They are well made and sturdy. Also dries quickly while on the boat and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much for the price, but these are thick noodle floats capable of holding 135 lb woman in the lake. They are well made and sturdy. Also dries quickly while on the boat and easy to store. I'm happy to have found these at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: leelee

customer_reviews.title: Pool Noodles Work Great
customer_reviews.text: The pool noodles should work for our purposes. We use them to construct bumpers for our robot.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 of these arrived broken in half. Not impressed by the quality at all.

customer_reviews.title: Skinnier pool noodles than expected .
customer_reviews.text: We were hoping to find the thicker, more supportive pool noodles, but seems my measurements were off. These are a bit smaller than I anticipated. I'm sure they will do, but I don't expect them to last more than a summer or two.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara41

customer_reviews.title: they are thinner than the normal ( almost half the ...
customer_reviews.text: they are thinner than the normal ( almost half the size) found out after I bought these all i had to do is go to the dollar store and get the thicker ones for 1.00
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Regan

customer_reviews.title: for my application I needed more density and the ones ...
customer_reviews.text: for my application I needed more density and the ones I had previous, met that application requirement. these noodles compressed and stayed that way after a couple use's. More diameter, higher, density needed here.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: I downgrade to 3 stars because they have a chemical ...
customer_reviews.text: I downgrade to 3 stars because they have a chemical odor. This, of course, is a matter of opinion on how one perceives them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Curious

customer_reviews.title: These are nice pool noodles
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pool noodles. They're a little longer than the ones you'll find in Target but appear to run about the same price. I purchased them as an alternative to a rail for my toddler's bed and they work excellent for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: ND Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. Used these as safe bumpers around the crib instead of pool noodles. Doubles as such and performs as expected. Great to have it on amazon when it is out of season in the stores
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: thin
customer_reviews.text: These are the thin pool noodles, only suitable for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica V.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know noodles came in different sizes. This one does not hold up an average person
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zuchelli

customer_reviews.title: Unwanted Substitution
customer_reviews.text: Ordered specifically for colors shown. Working on craft project. Came with two blue, no purple. Dang. If you are going to substitute....I'd appreciate notification before shipping. I would have chosen another brand. As it was, it was too late to return. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: J. smith

customer_reviews.title: Pool Noodles
customer_reviews.text: No, I don't have a pool, but thanks to some hints on BuzzFeed, pool noodles may be the creative solutions to everyday problems....garage bumper guards, hanger covers for trousers (without creases), furniture guards, hose extensions... They arrived quickly and securely, but are pretty indestructible of themselves. The price by this seller was better than most...I purchased only 4 and they'll last for years and lots of projects.
customer_reviews.author: TWrenn

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy overpriced Cannot return unless I box them and pay for shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: I found it exactly as in the photo on my step. Exposed in clear thin plastic for all the world to see, mock and or steal.
customer_reviews.author: R + K

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIY projects
customer_reviews.text: We used them to make a diy dance floor for our small studio space! They were sturdy and held up well while cutting, and are holding up our floor. It feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Other use for pool noodles
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how these work in the water. We bought them to keep the 9 mo. baby from knocking his tiny teeth out on the edge of the heavy glass coffee table. We just slit them down one side with a box cutter and jammed them all around the sharp table edge. It worked like a charm. Baby could pull up and cruse around the table without our freaking out. 😳 plus both the baby and the cat enjoyed playing with the small cut pieces leftover.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Allgeier

customer_reviews.title: Unique use.
customer_reviews.text: So, I used these to hold my tall boots up so they don't get a crease in the ankle/calf area. A bread knife and a pool noodle, measure the length of the boot and saw it off. Left over pieces make great, yet not too long, swords for small children.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Not large enough
customer_reviews.text: These noodles were shorter and skinnier than what I expected, I should have paid closer attention to the specifications. I bought them along with mesh chairs that require pool noodles to float, but these noodles were too small. For average sized adults, using two noodles at the same time worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than normal pool noodles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the multi colored Pool noodles. They are thinner than ones you buy in stores and slightly shorter also but other than that they were nice sturdy pool noodles! Fun colors!
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: They float.
customer_reviews.text: These seem very high quality. They are rigid, yet soft to the touch; if something hard were to be placed inside, like a bamboo shaft or perhaps some bones, they should simulate flesh relatively well . The noodles arrive in a variety of four different colors, so when you slice parts off with your katana, you can more easily examine your work in the aftermath. Would recommend for a cheap tatami omote substitute.
customer_reviews.author: C. vigoren

customer_reviews.title: Thicker and more sturdy than some
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they're a bit thicker and sturdier than some other pool noodles I've used in crafts. They're great for all sorts of things! And this four-pack was a bargain. This is going to keep me occupied for a bit this fall and winter! If you are into doing crafts with pool noodles, I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: C. Grice

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses and a great cat toy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected, came quickly. I don't use them in the pool though - I cut them up to use in my boots to keep them upright, and as a bonus the cat loves playing with and attacking them. My leftover pieces are her new favorite toys! She bites and kicks them and they haven't flaked or fallen apart (I was worried that she might chew off pieces and eat them and get sick, or make a mess on the carpet with the bits).
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: no more lost pillows
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this instead of a mattress wedge. I have a new bed that has no bedframe. Nor have I decided on a headboard. So the difference in space between wall and mattress can vary. May need to add one more noodle, or lose one. I live in an apartment building, and two weeks later anothedrt resikdent asked if i use it in my bathtub. cute
customer_reviews.author: bp/nj

product_meta.title: Coast Athletic Famous Foam Pool Noodles, 4 Piece
feature_bullets: Measures 58" by 2.25 " (the center hole is between 1/2" and 3/4" diameter)
Assorted bright colors, as the colors you receive may vary from the picture and are chosen at random
Great for a variety of pool games
